attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enforce able bodied people who are on benefits and who wish to work to clear pavements, minor roads, etc from snow to allow business/schools/transport to carry on.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
